@Module.Name: Predict
@Module.Description: This module is a prediction model, predicting what will appear after clicking each components on current screen

Output.<div id=7 class='' description='Navigate: Navigate back to the previous page

@Module.Name: Select
@Module.Description: This module is a selection model, selecting the 5 possible component without relativity ranking to be acted on catering to user's intent
@Module.Note: This individual module only select 5 highly related components,without ranking them,and without analyzing the correctness of the components aligning with user's content

Output.<div id=1 class='' > Third Party Notices: This component represents 'Third Party Notices' section in settings. While not directly related to the app version, it is commonly found within the 'About' section which user navigated to in the previous step.
Output.<div id=2 class='' > Legal notices </div: This component represents 'Legal Notices' option under settings. Although it generally doesn't contain app version information, it is usually found in the same section as the version number.
Output.<div id=3 class='' > Privacy policy </di: Similar to the 'Legal Notices', 'Privacy policy' option is often present in the 'About' section and might be worth considering for navigating in the settings page to find version.
Output.<div id=4 class='' > Terms of service </: The 'Terms of service' option falls under same reasoning with 'Privacy policy' as they tend to be placed near each other within the 'About' section.
Output.<div id=5 class='' > Version\n <p> \u: 'Version' is directly related to the user's intent. It contains version information of the Google App.

@Module.Name: Plan
@Module.Description: This module is a plan module, planning the next action based on the selected components, whether click or edit

candidate1.reason: To view the third-party notices, not relevant to checking the app version.

candidate2.reason: To view the legal notices, not relevant to checking the app version.

candidate3.reason: To view the privacy policy, not relevant to checking the app version.

candidate4.reason: To view the terms of service, not relevant to checking the app version.

candidate5.reason: To view the app version, as it contains the version information.

@Module.Name: Evaluate
@Module.Description: This module is an evaluation module, evaluating the selected components of their contribution to fulfilling the user's intent

@Module.Name: Decide
@Module.Description: This module is a decision module, deciding the final action based on the evaluation result, whether complete or wrong or go on

Output.reason: The user intended to check the Google app version and upon navigating the required settings has found the Google app version (‎14.3.13.29.arm64). Therefore, the task has been completed successfully.
